title: PC Andrew Harper's widow wins bid to change law
content: Ministers back Lissie Harper's campaign to jail those who kill on-duty police and 999 workers for life.

title: PC Andrew Harper's widow wins bid to change law
content: Ministers back Lissie Harper's campaign to jail those who kill on-duty police and 999 workers for life.

title: No babies allowed in Commons, MP told
content: Stella Creasy learns of the rule after appearing with her three-month-old at Westminster Hall.

title: Windrush scheme compounds injustice, say MPs
content: Most of those who applied for compensation have yet to receive a penny, a report by MPs has found.

title: MPs back ban on virginity testing, with jail terms
content: Health experts say the practice - which happens in at least 20 countries - violates human rights.

title: No extension to Scottish vaccine passport scheme
content: Nicola Sturgeon says the scheme will not be extended to cinemas and theatres, as had been widely expected.

title: The Pope praises Sir David Amess at funeral Mass
content: A Mass is held at Westminster Cathedral for the MP who was killed in his constituency last month.

title: Cyber-flashing likely to be made illegal - Dorries
content: The culture secretary says the change is likely to be included in a bill aimed at improving online safety.
